title: Spinach Artichoke Dip Cups
description: Creamy spinach artichoke dip in bite-sized, portable cups perfect for snacking or entertaining.

ingredients.item: of artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
fresh spinach leaves, stems removed and chopped
ingredients.notes: Fresh Baby Spinach by Earthbound Farm
Ritz Crackers or water crackers work well

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a standard 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners.
In a large skillet, heat the chopped artichoke hearts over medium heat for 3-4 minutes. Add the chopped spinach and cook until wilted, about 2-3 minutes. Season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, cream cheese, lemon juice, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Stir in the cooked artichoke and spinach mixture into the mayonnaise mixture until well combined.
Divide the dip mixture evenly among the muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 full.
Sprinkle a small amount of shredded mozzarella cheese over the top of each cup.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
